data.message: you know, we'd love a dislike button. more than anything. we'd love love love a dislike button.

replies.message: I agree, a dislike button would be nice.
Don't. There's enough cyber-bullying without that.
LOVE
yeah basically it would be a promotion of cyber-bullying.
yesss. so we could dislike this very post by facebook!
LMAO! it would have nothing to do with bullying!!!!! stupid people!
Let us have an opinion....DISLIKE BUTTON = Like!@
one idea I have heard them kick around is a "sympathize" button

I think a dislike button is a great idea!! For instance, when my friend posts something tragic, like "...my little red wagon only has three wheels, or my pet chicken only has one leg....", what kind of unfeeling cad would I be, if I "liked" that?? I mean, having a "dislike" button would be like......hey, man, I feel your pain!!!
A dislike button is just another form of negativity.
We need a "DISLIKE BUTTON" !!!!!!
I think a dislike button would make more sense for something like my friend or sister died. I cannot and will not click like for those announcements.
Then we could dislike everything Facebook posts. Yup, that so isn't gonna happen.

They actually had a dislike button for a short while. It was from a separate source somehow and I don't exactly understand how it worked. But only the people who had the app for it could see the dislike button, the amount of dislikes, and dislike it themselves. But it was abolished by FB. So I'm pretty sure they won't ever have a dislike button again.

Why? Do you like drama in your life? So many would be fighting about why they are butthurt over someone disliking their post. If you want that kind of drama go to a political post, state your opinion, sit back and enjoy the fun...
We'd like a dislike button for these changes!

@Clairetta Anderson When you see someone has posted about someone that has died, and you see that people like it..... It is NOT that they like it... It tells the person that you are following there status.... get real will ya
Facebook Yes a dislike button would be amazing!

@Corey Dunn - I think it was called Social Fixer. I remember having that. It was actually really buggy and sometimes it would take forever to update the actual "Dislike" count. I uninstalled it because it wasn't worth the adds. Didn't realize it was shut off.
well i don't like the new feed and we don't even get a choice, you just do it and that's that and i can't be changed back
Kinda sad that your option is "Agree with" or shut up....
I agree!
Ixnay on the dislike button. I've been on sites that have it.  Just creates more ways to be ugly.

the only problem with a dislike button is that it could be abused and an easy way for bullying to happen. but it would still be nice to have, and allow people to disable it if they don't want people using it on their posts.
I actually "liked" one of my sister-in-law's posts just so I could "unlike" it. I know it only matters in my own head, but yeah, I'd totally be behind a dislike button.
